dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 2765 IH: To prohibit the National Science Foundation from obligating amounts for the Polar Learning and Responding Climate Change Educational Partnership.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Salmon introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

form.official-title: To prohibit the National Science Foundation from obligating amounts for the Polar Learning and Responding Climate Change Educational Partnership.

section.text: The National Science Foundation may not obligate any amounts on or after the date of enactment of this Act for the Polar Learning and Responding Climate Change Educational Partnership.
